ygData.subject: location of sketches in or around Kaladim
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that to buy sketches I have to go to Kelethin, but I have been unsuccessful in finding the appropriate vendor there.  Can somebody be so kind as
ygData.messageBody: I have heard that to buy sketches I have to go to Kelethin, but I have been unsuccessful in finding the appropriate vendor there. Can somebody be so kind as to pinpoint who or what I am looking for? Maybe a loc or directions. I have made a 2nd character to pursue some of the things my poor little misunderstood Gnome Necro can not do in the world of Norath.
